description.short: Dashboard with basic searching capabilities using API's.
description.long: This is my first time building a working dashboard and experimenting with APIs. By searching for a Github user in the right search panel, you can see repositories. The YT Search button allows you to look for a YouTube video. There is also an easy dark and light mode switch, as well as the ability to search for a location at the top to get the current time and weather for that location.

description.short: Clone of website from Arne Quinze.
description.long: Arne Quinze is a sculptor, painter, and contemporary artist from Belgium. His work ranges from small sketches and paintings to medium-scale sculptures and large-scale installations. This was a project for Artevelde Hogeschool in which JSON files were used to load large amounts of data at once. Real website: https://www.arnequinze.com/.

description.short: Creation of all websites for the Broederscholen in Sint-Niklaas, Belgium.
description.long: I created the new website for every school from the Broederscholen in Sint-Niklaas. I created the theme for all of them in WordPress using Oxygen Builder. Meta Box is also used for dynamic content such as blog entries and classes.

description.short: Website for Katholiek Onderwijs Land van Waas, school group from Sint-Niklaas, Belgium.
description.long: The general school group Katholiek Onderwijs Land van Waas combines primary and secondary education. It's a generic website with downloadable documents and information. I built the website entirely in WordPress, utilizing Oxygen Builder to design the theme and Meta Box to provide dynamic information such as the various schools and downloadable documents.

description.short: Website for Sloep-Rent, a boat rental company based in Temse, Belgium.
description.long: Sloep-Rent, situated in Temse, Belgium, is a boat rental company. They rent out boats to sail over the Schelde for a specified time during the day (a nice river running through the beautiful nature of Belgium). This website was built in WordPress, with the theme designed using Elementor Pro and the boat rental module constructed using WooCommerce.

description.short: Project created for Artevelde. The app is a Tinder clone and has the capabilities to like fictional people.
description.long: This is a Tinder clone with a very limited set of features. Other people's likes, dislikes, and superlikes (all people in the app are fictional). In the app, you can chat with other individuals and check out their messages.

description.short: Project created for Artevelde. A clone of the website for Gentse Feesten 2020.
description.long: This website is a clone of Gentse Feesten 2020 and is fully functional. Gentse Feesten is a free festival held in the center Ghent, Belgium. I used slugs to create automatic pages, and there is also a search option.
